Bernardina pertenece al banco comunal “VALLE SAGRADO” de la Asociación Arariwa, tiene 73  años y tiene seis hijos. Su principal actividad económica  es vender locería y plastiqueria en el mercado modelo de calca. Ya son varios años que trabaja en el negocio y le va muy bien. Ella requiere el crédito para comprar ollas, sartenes y muchas cosas más.  Ella nos cuenta que su negocio bajo porque  no hay clientes debido a que el puente de la ciudad de Pisaq se cayó por causa del aumento el caudal del rio Vilcanota y por lo tanto no hay pasada para la ciudad de Calca.
   
Bernardina se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.   La ciudad de Calca se encuentra ubicado a una hora y diez minutos de la ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Bernardina is a member of the Communal Bank “Valle Sagrado” (Sacred Valley), which is part of Asociación Arariwa. She is 73 years old and has six children. Bernandina sells earthenware and plastic containers at the standard market in Calca. She has worked in this business for several years and has done very well. The loan she is requesting will be used to purchase pots, pans, and other items. She says business is slow because there are no customers since the bridge in the city of Pisaq collapsed due to overflow from the Vilcanota River. Therefore, no one is able to reach the city of Calca.

Bernardina is grateful for this opportunity that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments on time. The city of Calca is located an hour and ten minutes from the city of Cusco.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase pots, pans, and other items

loans.name: Samwel Kontire

texts.en:
Samwel Kontire K. is 24 years- old and married to Kilokunye K..  He is the father of one school going child.

Samwel is a farmer and he has been doing this for the last five years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for wheat farming.

He learned about Kiva partner KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in his area of residence. This will be his first loan which he is planning to use to buy chemicals and fertilizer for his wheat plants.  He hopes to use the profit from this loan to acquire more land for farming to meet the demand for the farm produce.

His hope and dream is to become a large scale farmer and have his own farm machinery.

Samwel is a young and energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: To buy chemicals and fertilzer .

loans.name: Anne B.

texts.fr: G. Anne B. vit depuis une dizaine d'année au quartier Irédé à Cotonou, capitale économique du Bénin. Mariée à RAMAN Tidjani, Anne est mère de deux enfants qui sont tous scolarisés. Anne vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges familiales. N'ayant jamais été à l'école, Anne mène comme activité, la vente de maïs et d'akassa (aliment local fait à base d'amidon de maïs) à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Anne vend également des fagots de bois. C'est à Dantokpa, marché international du Bénin, que Anne achète ses produits. Anne est une ancienne cliente de ALIDé, qui a toujours bien effectué ses remboursements. La clientèle de Anne s'accroit au jour le jour, et Anne n'arrive plus à satisfaire tous ses clients, compte tenu du peu de moyens financiers dont elle dispose. C'est donc pour renforcer son activité que Anne sollicite un autre prêt.
texts.en:
Anne B. G. has lived in the Irédé neighborhood of Cotonou, the economic capitol of Bénin for a decade. Married to Tidjani Raman, Anne is the mother of two children whom she sends to school. Anne lives with her husband and children. The couple shares the family responsibilities. Having never been to school, Anne was lead to the sale of corn and akassa (a local food made from a base of corn starch) from her home as a job. As a supplemental income, Anne also sells bundles of firewood. Anne buys her product at Dantokpa, the international market of Benin. Anne is a former client of ALIDé who has always well carried out her repayments. Anne's cliental increases from day to day, and she no longer manages to satisfy all of her customers considering the small amount of cash she has at her disposal. It is for this reason she would like to strengthen her business with another loan.

Translated from French by Colleen Creegan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: The purchase of bags of corn

loans.name: Parshila Ole

texts.en:
Parshila Ole M. is 47-years-old, married to Sipoi M. and the father of eight children. 

Parshila has been a wheat farmer for the last seven years.

Parshila learned about Kiva partner KADET from a colleague who was already a KADET registered client. This will be his fourth loan. He is planning to use Kshs 30,000 for wheat planting, Kshs 20,000 for maize farming and Kshs 30,000 to plant potatoes. With the profits he hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to hire more land for farming to increase his wheat and other farm production.

His future dream is that he will be able to buy a bigger piece of land so that he can plant more wheat for commercial purposes and build a good house. He is a hard working man who is determined to achieve his set goals.

loans.use: To plant wheat, potatoes and maize.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: LA SRA. MIRIAM ESTA CASADA TIENE HIJOS QUE SE ENCUENTRAN EN EDAD ESCOLAR,LA SRA. MIRIAM TIENE UNA CARPINTERIA DOND. REALIZAN MUEBLES D. MADERA, ESTE NEGOCIO TIENE APROXIMADAMENTE 15 AÑO D. EXPERIENCIA QUIEN ELLA JUNTAMENTE CON SU ESPOSO SE LEVANTAN DESD. LA MADRUGADA PARA PODER TRABAJAR EN ESTO, PARALELO A ESTE TRABAJO ELLA DEBE PREPARAR LA COMIDA PARA CUANDO LOS HIJOS RETORNEN DEL COLEGIO. ELLOS COMENZARON REALIZANDO TRABAJOS PARA PERSONAS EXTERNAS  QUIENES ERAN LOS QUE LAS VENDIAN, CON EL TIEMPO LLEGARON A COMPRAR MAQUINARIA Y LOGRAR PRODUCIR MAS MUEBLES PARA ELLOS COMERCIALIZARLOS, SU ESPOSO REALIZA LOS MUEBLES ELLA LE AYUDA Y TAMBIEN SE ENCARGA D. VENDERLOS AL POR MAYOR. CON EL DINERO DEL CREDITO COMPRARA MADERA PARA REALIZAR MUEBLES YA QUE TIENE UN PEDIDO GRAND., EL DESEO D. LA SRA. MIRIAM ES LA D. TENER UNA MUEBLERIA RECONOCIDA Y RELIZAR MODELOS NOVEDOSOS PARA COMPLACER A SUS CLIENTES, ESTA MUY AGARDECIDA CON EMPRENDER Y KIVA POR LA CONFIANZA BRINDADA EN LA OTORGACION DEL CREDITO.
texts.en:
Miriam is married and has school-aged children. She has a carpentry shop where she makes wooden furniture. She has about 15 years of experience with this business. She and her husband get up at dawn to do their work, and Miriam also has to prepare food for when the children come home from school. They started by making products for other people, who were the ones who sold the furniture. In time they were able to buy machinery and produce more furniture so they could go into business for themselves. Miriam's husband makes the furniture; she helps him and is also in charge of selling the items wholesale. With the loan money she will buy wood to build furniture since she has a large order. Miriam wants to have a well-known furniture store and make new models to please her customers. She is very grateful to Emprender and Kiva for the confidence placed in her with the granting of this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing wood

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es: Doña Maria vive junto con su familia, tiene la edad de 60 años, mujer que desde joven ha logrado las expectativa gracias al apoyo de su familia y esposo que junto trabajan para lograr los objetivos, del negocio  la venta de espejos decorados, cuadros en óleo el cual son muy vendido por ser paisajes bonitos y Nicaragüenses. Estos productos son elaborados por varios trabajadores que tienen, y son distribuidos en diferentes departamentos del país el cual sé dan al crédito y alguno al contado. Desde que inicio su negocio es poder lograr el crecimiento en sus ventas. Es por eso viajan a muchos kilómetros de la capital para poder ofertar sus espejos ya que la demanda es alta. Con este crédito incrementara el volumen de  productos en donde comprara: yeso, pinturas, espejo, pintura para pintar los cuadros, madera, marcos. Lograr con esto aumentar las ventas y cubrir los gastos del negocio como personal.
texts.en:
Doña Maria is a 60 year old woman who lives with her family. From a young age, Maria has been able to live up to expectations thanks to the support of her family and her husband who have worked with her to achieve her objectives. She manages a business selling decorated mirrors and oil paintings of beautiful Nicaraguan landscapes. These products are produced by various workers that she hires and then distributed to different parts of the country. Her sales are made on credit and sometimes in cash. Since starting her business, Maria has been able to increase her sales. For this reason, she travels several kilometers to the capital to sell her mirrors which are in great demand.

This loan will allow her to increase the volume of products she offers. She plans to buy plaster, various types of paint, mirrors, wood, and frames. Maria will be able to generate more sales and cover both her business and personal expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase plaster, various types of paint, mirrors, wood, and frames

loans.name: Prudencia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Prudencia del Carmen Martínez Velazques una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y esforzada. Está señora de 56 años en un inicio se dedicaba al comercio de frutas en el mercado luego comenzó a realizar frescos de cacao, melón, piña, licuados, ensalada de frutas, guayaba, naranja, limón, linaza etc. Los cuales se vendían con mucha facilidad. 

Ella con el préstamo compra mercadería para su negocio especialmente las frutas para realizar estos deliciosos y refrescantes frescos.
texts.en:
Prudencia del Carmen Martínez Velazquez is 56 years old and a strong, hardworking, and enterprising woman. She started selling fruit at the market, but later she began selling refreshments made of cacao, melon, pineapple, fruit juice, fruit cocktail, guava, oranges, lemon, flaxseed, and other ingredients. These drinks sell very easily.

She will use this loan to buy merchandise for her business, especially fruits that make her beverages delicious and refreshingly cool.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fruits for making beverages

loans.name: Elcie

texts.es:
Elcie H. M., tiene la edad de 44 años, está casada, y vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 20 y  15 años de edad, que son su mayor prioridad. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, la idea es comprar el abono y el fertilizante. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de café para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Doña Elcie también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora. 
About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Elcie H. M. is 44 years old, married, and lives with her husband and two children (ages 20 and 15). Her loan will be used for attending to her farm, specifically for growing coffee. She plans to buy compost and fertilizers so that she can adequately maintain her coffee crop in order to obtain better quality and the best price when it is time to harvest. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR and she is very happy with the services that have been provided.

Doña Elcie has been farming for many years. She hopes to provide a better quality of life and greater financial stability for her family. In addition, she wants to continue growing as a person and as a producer.

About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase compost & fertilizers for her coffee crop

loans.name: Fatoumata

texts.fr: Madame Fatoumata N. est une vendeuse de poissons fumes, balais, karité, encens. Elle vient de démarrer l’activité cette année. Elle est âgée de 54 ans et habite dans le quartier de Ngaparou à Yoff. Elle est mariée, mère de 6 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 18 et 33 ans. Madame N.  a été  relai communautaire pendant, 10 ans dans le programme de développement de l’enfant et de la famille a Yoff. Elle a arrêté cette occupation en appliquant les conseils de sa mère pour mieux se consacrer au commerce, faire des bénéfices et satisfaire ses besoins. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs destine a l’achat de produits qu’elle commercialise et qui sont destines a la vente. Son objectif est aussi d’accroitre ses bénéfices et améliorer les conditions de vie de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mrs Fatoumata N. sells smoked fish, brooms, shea and incense; she began doing this only this year. She is 54 years old, and a married mother of 6 children aged between 18 and 33; they live in the Ngaparou quarter of Yoff. Mrs N. was a community mobiliser for a child and family development programme for ten years. She gave this up and followed her mother's advice to concentrate on business, generate profits and meet her family's needs. She is seeking a 100 000 FRS loan to purchase products to sell. Her aim is to increase her profits and improve her children's quality of life.

Translated from French by Danielle Treharne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: increasing business funds

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: La Sra. Cristina tiene un consultorio donde brinda servicios de enfermería, tales como toma de presión arterial, curaciones, test de embarazos, inyecciones, etc.; tiene un año aproximadamente en esta actividad ya que el año pasado terminó su carrera de enfermería, anteriormente tenía una fotocopiadora, pero su sueño siempre fue tener su propio consultorio. Tiene un hijo que está en edad escolar, ella sola se dedica a su manutención, vive en la zona de Pampahasi, y es muy conocida por la zona. el crédito será invertido en completar el saldo que le falta para tomar el local en anticrético, ya que le está yendo bien, es una persona responsable y trabajadora con ganas de superacion desea mejorar la calidad de vida de toda su familia, esta muy agradecida con Emprender y Kiva por la confianza brindada en la otorgacion del credito.
texts.en:
Sra. Cristina operates a clinic where she offers her services as a nurse, which include blood pressure checks, first aid, pregnancy tests, injections, etc. She started this business a year ago shortly after finishing her nursing degree. Cristina previously managed a photocopy shop, but her dream had always been to establish her own clinic. She has a son who is of school age and is dedicated to supporting him. Cristina lives in the Pamphasi district and is well-known in the area.

Her loan will be used to cover the remaining balance that is required to enter into an “anticrético” lease agreement so that she can secure the location for her clinic. (In an “anticrético” arrangement, the owner leases property for a lump sum deposit in lieu of monthly rent. At the end of the lease period, the money is returned to the renter. If the owner fails to repay the money, the renter gets to keep the property.) Cristina’s business is doing well. She is a responsible and hardworking person who desires to improve herself and provide a better quality of life for her entire family.

Cristina is extremely grateful to Emprender and Kiva for their confidence in her by providing this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Invest in an “anticrético” lease agreement to secure the location for her clinic

loans.name: Kathia

texts.es:
Kathia C. L., tiene la edad de 39 años, está casada, y vive con su esposo. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, la idea es comprar el abono y el fertilizante. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de café para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Doña Kathia también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora. 
About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Kathia C. L. is 39 years old, married, and lives with her husband. Her loan will be used for attending to her farm, specifically for growing coffee. She plans to buy compost and fertilizers so that she can adequately maintain her coffee crop in order to obtain better quality and the best price when it is time to harvest. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR and is very happy with the services that have been provided.

Doña Kathia has been farming for many years. She hopes to provide a better quality of life and greater financial stability for her family. In addition, she wants to continue growing as a person and as a producer.

About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase compost & fertilizers for her coffee crop

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es:
Lorena V. J., tiene la edad de 39 años, está casada, y vive su esposo y tres hijos de 18,15 y 9 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de inventario para su negocio. Desea tener un inventario más amplio y variado de productos para ofrecer en su pulpería. Tiene varios años de haber empezado con este negocio, y cuenta con muy buenos clientes, por eso ve la necesidad de ofrecer mayor variedad de productos en el negocio, además de aportar mayores ingresos para la economía de su hogar. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy agradecida con las facilidades que se le han brindado siempre. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como comerciante.
About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Lorena V. J. is 39 years old, married and lives with her husband and three children, 19,15 and 9 years old. She wants the loan to be able to buy inventory for her business. She wants a more varied and extensive product inventory in her general store. She has been in this business for several years and has good customers, and that is her reason for wanting to be able to offer a more varied product line. This will also increase her household income. This is her first loan with Fudecosur and is very thankful for the opportunities that the organization has given her. She expects in the future to be able to provide a better quality of life and more financial stability to her family and to continue growing as a person and as a business woman. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Laura Bobbit, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Product inventory

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: EL SR. ARMANDO VIVE EN LA LOCALIDAD DE EL TORNO DISTANTE A 40 KM DE LA CIUDAD DE SANTA CRUZ, SU ACTIVIDAD PRINCIPAL ES LA CARPINTERIA, SE DEDICA A ESTA PROFESION HACE 15 AÑOS, TIENE 1 HIJO PEQUEÑO, SU ESPOSA SE DEDICA AL CUIDADO DE SU PEQUEÑO, EL SOLO SE ENCARGA DE LA MANUTENCION DEL HOGAR, EL DESTINO DEL CREDITO ES PARA PONER EN CONDICIONES A SU VEHICULO QUE ES SU HERRAMIENTA PARA TRANSPORTE DE SU MERCADERIA, TIENE DOMICILIO PROPIO LO CUAL LO ADQUIRIO CON FINANCIAMIENTO, Y TRABAJANDO FUERTE, PARA CUBRIR DICHAS CUOTAS, POR LO TANTO EL SE SIENTE CONTENTO YA QUE MEDIANTE FINANCIAMIENTO A LLEGADO A TENER SU PROPIAS COSAS, SUS DESEOS ES TENER UN NEGOCIO ESTABLE Y SOLIDO, ESTA MUY AGRADECIDO CON EMPRENDER Y KIVA POR LA CONFIANZA BRINDADA EN LA OTORGACION DEL CREDITO.
texts.en:
Sr. Armando lives in the town of El Torno, which is 40km from the city of Santa Cruz. He has been a carpenter for fifteen years. His wife is responsible for looking after their young child. Armando is in charge of supporting his household by himself.

His loan will be designated for his vehicle, which is used for transporting his goods. Armando has his own home that he purchased with the help of financing. He continues to work hard to cover his loan payments. Armando is happy that the loans have helped him acquire his own things. He hopes to have a stable and solid business.

Armando is extremely grateful to both Emprender and Kiva for demonstrating their confidence in him by providing this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase tires for his work vehicle

loans.name: Aida Lizeidi

texts.es:
Aida Lizeidi P. F., tiene la edad de 35 años, es casada, y tiene 3 hijos de 17,16 y 14 años de edad respectivamente, ellos son su mayor prioridad. El crédito lo quiere para comprar materiales y remodelar la porqueriza, además, de comprar algunos cerdos para la cría. La idea es darle el adecuado mantenimiento a los cerdos para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando se vendan. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Doña Aida tiene varios años en este negocio de cría de cerdos. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora.

About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Aida Lizeidi P. F., age 35, is married and has three children who are 17, 16, and 14 years old; they are her first priority. Aida is asking for a loan to buy materials for remodeling the pigsty as well as to purchase pigs for raising. She would like to give her livestock the right maintenance so that they could bring good income when they are sold. This is the first time she has approached FUDECOSUR for a loan, and she is very pleased with the credit terms they offer. Aida has several years of experience in the livestock business. In the future, she hopes to bring a better quality of life and a greater financial stability to her family; she also hopes to continue to grow as a person and as a livestock farmer. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Andrei Vazhnov, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Remodeling of the pigsty and purchase of pigs

loans.name: Evelin

texts.es: Evelin de 37 años de edad es soltera, Helmut de 13 años es su unico hijo y esta estudiando el 6to grado de primaria. Evelin trabaja para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 3 años como operador siscat de catastro.  Esta solicitando su 1er credito con el objetivo de obtener su propia vivienda, ya que actualmente no cuenta con una, sin embargo tiene su propio terreno y se inscribio en el proyecto colmena, quien le levantara su casita, pero necesita dar un aporte economico, aunque cuenta con una parte, pero le hace falta el financiamiento que solicita, y  espera contar con el apoyo de AFODENIC y Kiva para terminar este proyecto.  El mayor sueño que tiene es poder tener su casita y mejorarla en la medida que pueda ya que es el patrimonio que le dejara a su hijo.
texts.en:
Evelin is a 37 year old single mother to her only child Helmut, who is 13 years old and a sixth grade student. She has worked the past three years for the City of Juigalpa as a property tax surveyor. Evelin is requesting her first loan with hopes of acquiring her own home since she currently does not have one. However, she does have a plot of land on which to build. Evelin is enrolled in a housing program that will help her with the construction, but she needs to make a down payment in order for the work to begin. The problem is that she lacks the necessary funds. For this reason, she is depending on the support of AFODENIC and Kiva so that she can continue in the program.

Her greatest wish is to have her own house and make improvements to it so that one day she can leave it as an inheritance for her son.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Make the down payment required to begin the construction of her house

loans.name: Souleymane

texts.fr: Monsieur Souleymane S. est un éboueur qui exerce ce métier depuis 1978 après avoir quitte la Compagnie Sucrière Sénégalaise. Il a démarré  grâce a la proposition  de la mairie. Monsieur S. habite a Yoff Mbenguene et a 56 ans d’existence. Il est marie et père de 6 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 10 et 33 ans. Son revenu mensuel étant insuffisant pour nourrir une telle famille il emprunte 50 000 frs pour aider son fils tailleur a acquérir une machine a coudre dans l’espoir que ce dernier avec revenus pourra apporter un soutien a la famille.
texts.en:
Mr Souleymane S. has worked as a dustman since 1978 when he quit working at the Senegalese Sugar Company. He began here thanks to an offer from the town authorities. Mr S. lives in Yoff Mbenguene and is a 56 year- old married father of 6 children aged between 10 and 33. Since his monthly income is not enough to feed his family, he is seeking to borrow 50 000 FRS to help his tailor son to buy a sewing machine in the hope that this will bring in revenue to help the family.

Translated from French by Danielle Treharne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Aquiles Adalberto

texts.es:
Aquiles de 62 años de edad habita junto a su familia en la Comarca San Esteban, esta casado con la Sra. Reyna Guzman con quien procreo 4 hijos, Ariel de 18 años es el mayor y trabaja, Alejandra de 15 años estudia el 3er año de secundaria, Juan de 12 años y Diana de 9 años estudian la primaria. Don Aquiles trabaja para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 28 años como conductor.  

Esta solicitando su 1er credito a esta institucion para mejorar su vivienda repellando y poniendole ceramica a un cuarto, y de esta manera tener mas comodidad.  

El mayor sueño de Aquiles es poder tener una vivienda bonita y digna para su familia, que es por quienes trabaja.
texts.en:
Aquiles is 62 years old and lives with his family in the region of San Esteban. He is married to Sra. Reyna Guzman, with whom he has four children. Ariel is the oldest child. He is 18 years old and working. Alejandra is a 15 year old student who is in her third year of high school. Juan is 12 years old and Diana is 9 years old. Both are in elementary school. Don Aquiles has worked as a driver for the City of Juigalpa for the past 28 years.

He is requesting his first loan from AFODENIC in order to make improvements to his home by plastering the walls and installing a ceramic floor in one of the rooms to make it more comfortable. Aquiles says his greatest wish is to have a beautiful and decent home for his family, which is why he continues to work.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Plaster the walls & install a ceramic floor in a room of his house

loans.name: Ricardo Francisco

texts.es:
Ricardo Francisco R.  de 56 años desde el 2000 se dedica al comercio de tomates  fruta muy apetecida por los nicaragüenses ya que se utilizan ya sea para realizar ensaladas, salsas y en la preparación de otros alimentos. Estos don Ricardo los cuales comercializa por balde o medio balde en el mercado de Masaya.
El con el préstamo el comprar cosecha de dicha fruta que actualmente tienen un precio muy alto.
texts.en:
Since 2000, Ricardo Francisco R., 56, has made a living buying and selling tomatoes, a fruit especially loved by Nicaraguans because they use it to make salads, salsas and other dishes. Don Ricardo sells his produce by the bucket or half-bucket in the market at Masaya. Don Ricardo will use the loan to buy tomatoes which are currently selling at a very high price.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy tomatoes to resell

loans.name: Mauricio Javier

texts.es:
Mauricio  de 41 años de edad es casado con la Sra. Zulema Garcia con quien tiene 2 niños, Nayelis de 7 años en 2do grado de primaria y Fabricio de 3 añitos.  Mauricio trabaja en el Hospital Asuncion de Juigalpa desde hace 13 años como kardista. 

Esta solicitando su 5to Credito a esta institucion con el objetivo de mejorar su casa cambiando el techo que se encuentra en mal estado y mejorar el baño de su casa.  Expresa que con los creditos obtenidos en AFODENIC ha podido mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, ya que los ha utilizado en la construccion de su vivienda. 

Su mayor sueño es tener su casa con las condiciones basicas para que su familia viva en un ambiente comodo y agradable.
texts.en:
Mauricio is 41 years old. He and his wife Zulema Garcia have two children: Nayelis, age seven, who is in his second year of elementary school and three-year-old Fabricio. For thirteen years, Mauricio has been working at the Asuncion Hospital as a storage manager. Mauricio is asking for his fifth loan with AFODENIC with the goal of making improvements in his house. He would like to change the roof, which is in poor condition and make improvements to his bathroom. Mauricio says that thanks to the loans he has obtained with AFODENIC, he has been able to improve the living conditions for his family since he has used the loans to build his home. Mauricio's biggest dream is to have a house that has all the basic necessities so that his family could live in an environment that is pleasant and comfortable.

Translated from Spanish by Andrei Vazhnov, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Changing the roof and improving the bathroom

loans.name: Janery Del Carmen

texts.es:
Janery de 34 años de edad habita en el municipio de La Libertad, es casada con el Sr. Luis Alvarez con quien tiene 2 hijos, la mayor Hermida de 16 años de edad estudiando 3er año de secundaria y Danyeli de 2 añitos.  Trabaja como docente para el MINED de La Libertad desde hace 17 años, en la Escuela Base Rafaela Herrera en la comunidad de Cosmatillo. Su esposo es albañil y trabaja fuera porque aqui no encuentra mucho trabajo, pero le envia dinero para los gastos del hogar. 

Janery esta solicitando su 6to credito para mejorar la vivienda en donde vive, construyendo un sumidero, y desea hacerlo antes que empiece el invierno.  

El mayor sueño que tiene es que su familia viva con las condiciones necesarias y que sus hijas estudien y sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Janery, age 34, lives in the municipality of La Libertad with her two children and her husband Luis Alvarez. The elder daughter Hermida is 16 and is a third-year high-school student; the younger Danyeli is two years old. For 17 years, Janery has been working as a teacher for the Ministry of Education of La Liberdad, in the Rafaela Herrera school, located in the Cosmatillo community. Janery's husband is a construction worker, and he works out of town because where they live there isn't much available work; he sends her money to cover household expenses. Janery is seeking her sixth loan which will be used to make improvements in her home; she is installing a drain and would like to finish it before the winter comes. Janery's biggest dream is that her family would have everything they need, and that her daughters would study and grow up to become good people.

Translated from Spanish by Andrei Vazhnov, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Installation of a drain

loans.name: Juana Concepcion

texts.es:
Juana de 52 años de edad es casada con el Sr. Orlando Mejia con quien tiene  3 hijas, Katia de 32 años que le ayuda con el cuido de la casa y a los abuelitos, Keydi de 17 años que se acaba de bachillerar y Karen de 12 años en 2do año de secundaria. Juana trabaja para el MINSA SILAIS Chontales desde hace 15 años como Responsable de insumos.  Gracias a un proyecto de vivienda doña Juana obtuvo la oportunidad de tener su casa, la cual esta pagando con cuotas mensuales.

Esta solicitando  su 7mo credito con el objetivo de mejorar su casa, construyendo una tapia para brindar mayor seguridad a su familia, ya que su esposo trabaja fuera de la ciudad y ella por su trabajo viaja durante la semana.  

El mayor deseo que tiene es poder tener una casa bonita y con las condiciones necesarias para que su familia se sienta comoda.
texts.en:
Juana is 52 years old. She and her husband Orlando Mejia have three daughters: Katia, age 32, who helps run the house and take care of the grandparents, Keydi, age 17, who is finishing high school, and Karen, age 12, who is in her second year of high school. For 15 years, Juana has been working in the Chontales division of the Ministry of Health’s Comprehensive Local Health System (MINSA SILAIS) as a manager of supplies. Thanks to a housing project, Juana was able to get her own home; she is now paying for it in monthly installments. Juana is requesting her seventh loan which will be used to make improvements in her home. She is building a fence wall to provide greater security for her family. This is especially important since her husband works out of town, and Juana herself also travels for work during the week. Her greatest wish is to have a nice house and all the conditions necessary to make her family feel comfortable.

Translated from Spanish by Andrei Vazhnov, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of a fence wall

loans.name: Enlazando Group

texts.es:
El grupo Enlazando está integrado por tres personas trabajadoras una de ellas es María de la Concepción S. P. quien se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años de maíz, frijoles, tomates y chiltomas. Ella con el préstamo prepara la tierra para el cultivo de las frutas antes mencionadas. 

Sus compañeras de grupo son  Alejandra del Carmen S. hace años inicio con una pequeña venta y ahora tiene una pulpería en la que invertirá el crédito con la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de productos y Geyling  Arelis  Hernández Guzmán de diecinueve años quien desde hace tres años vende nacatamales.
texts.en:
The Enlazando group consists of three hard-working women. One of them is María de la Concepción S. P.; she has been working in agriculture for several years, growing corn, beans, tomatoes, and sweet peppers. María will be using the loan to prepare her fields for growing the aforementioned vegetables. Her fellow group members are Alejandra del Carmen S. and Geyling Arelis Hernández. Alejandra started a small retail business a few years ago and now has a convenience store; she plans to use her loan to purchase a greater variety of products and increase her inventory. Geyling, who is nineteen, has been selling nacatamales (a Nicaraguan dish) for three years.

Translated from Spanish by Andrei Vazhnov, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: manure, seeds,  plow

loans.name: El Hadj

texts.fr: Monsieur EL Hadj V. est un yoffois  de 37 ans qui habite dans le quartier de Mbenguene. Il est marie et père d’un enfant d’un an. Il est membre de la caisse de Yoff depuis seulement février  2010. Monsieur V. s’adonne à la vente de chapelets depuis 1999. Mais depuis 2009 il cumule son activité  avec le métier  de gardiennage dans  une école du quartier. C’est son marabout qui l’a ordonne  de  choisir la vente de chapelets comme activité  après qu’il ait termine  l’apprentissage  a faire des chapelets. Il sollicite un crédit de 50 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de fils de différentes couleurs et de perles pour augmenter son stock de chapelets et diversifier son offre a la clientèle. Son objectif reste d’augmenter ses profits afin d’d’aider son père et son frère a gérer  le quotidien. Il souhaite aussi assister sa famille sur le plan sanitaire et nutritionnel.
texts.en:
Mr El Hadj V. is a 37 year-old resident of Mbenguene, Yoff. He is married and has a one year-old child and has only been a member of the Yoff credit association since February 2010. Mr V. has sold rosaries for a living since 1999; but in 2009 he accompanied this activity by becoming a caretaker at a local school. His holy teacher suggested he choose this business activity once he had finished his rosary-making apprenticeship. He is seeking a 50 000 FRS loan to purchase different colour thread and beads in order to enlarge his inventory of rosaries and widen the choice for his customers. His aim is to increase his profits in order to help his father and brother to meet everyday costs and to help with his family's health and nutritional needs.

Translated from French by Danielle Treharne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: boost stock levels

loans.name: Wilson Kiptarbei

texts.en:
Wilson Kiptarbei L. is a gentleman who is 29 years-old. He is married to Clara L. and together they have been blessed with three beautiful children who are all in primary school. 

Wilson is a maize farmer and he has been farming for 12 years now. His farm is in an area called Sinonin where he also lives with his family.  He normally practices cash crop farming where he sells maize to his neighbors after harvesting.

Wilson came to know about Kiva partner KADET through another existing client and this will be his first loan through KADET. He is planning to use the entire loan for farm inputs.  He will buy two bags of maize seedlings worth 4,000, plough with 8,000 shillings and plant with the rest of the money. 

His dream is to become a better farmer, expand his farm and increase his production.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter has been in farming since 2000.  He normally sell his farm produce in Naivasha market as he is a small scale farmer.  He is 43 years-old and married to Milka Wanjiru and they have four school going children.

He was introduced to Kiva partner KADET by his friend and this will be his second loan with the organization.   He plans to use this cash to pay his casual workers and also buy fertilizer for his farm.

He plans to build a green house in future.  This will enable him to plant throughout the year instead of relying on the unreliable rainy seasons.

loans.use: To buy fertiliser and pay his casual workers.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo A. S., tiene la edad de 57 años, está casado, y vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos los cuales tienen 18, 15, 16 y 9 años de edad, que son su prioridad. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, la idea es comprar algunas plantas de café para la siembra, además, del abono y el fertilizante. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de café para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Gerardo también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. 
About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Gerardo A. S. is 57, married, and lives with his wife and four children: 18, 15, 16 and 9. The family is his priority. The loan that he is asking for is to help his farm, specifically in the cultivation of coffee. The idea is to buy some coffee plants to sow, as well as fertilizer and manure. He intends to give good care to the coffee so that he can have better quality and thus get the most profit possible during harvest time. This is the first time he is asking for a loan from FUDECOSUR and he is very happy with the facilities offered him. Don Gerardo also has worked for many years in farming. He hopes to offer a better quality of life to his family and more economic stability, and to continue growing as a person and producer. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Miriam Palacio, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Help cultivating coffee

loans.name: Jose  Martin

texts.es: EL SEÑOR JOSE VIVE EN LA LOCALIDAD DE EL TORNO DISTANTE A 40 KM DE LA CIUDAD DE SANTA CRUZ, EN LA COMUNIDAD DE SAN CARLOS, DISTANTE 15KM DE EL MUNICIPIO DE EL TORNO, ESTA CASADO  SU ACTIVIDAD ES EL TRANSPORTE DE PERSONA A DICHA LOCALIDAD, SU ESPOSA SE DEDICA  A LABORES DE CASA, TIENE TRES HIJOS A SU CARGO QUE YA SON MAYORES, SU DESEO ES TENER SU CASA PROPIA EN EN LA LOCALIDAD DE EL TORNO QUE ES LA CAPITAL DEL MUNICIPIO AL QUE PERTENECE, CON EL DINERO DEL CREDITO COMPRARA LLANTAS PARA EL ARREGLO DE SU VEHICULO YA QUE ESTA TENIENDO FALLAS Y NO LE PERMITE BRINDAR UN MEJOR SERVICIO A SUS CLIENTES, ESTA MUY AGRADECIDO CON EMPRENDER Y KIVA POR LA CONFIANZA BRINDADA EN LA OTORGACION DEL CREDITO.
texts.en:
Sr. Jose lives in the town of El Torno, which is 40km from the city of Santa Cruz and 15km from the community of San Carlos. He provides passenger transport services to the local residents. His wife is a homemaker and they have three adult children who still live with them. Jose hopes to acquire his own home in El Torno, which is the municipal capital.

The money from his loan will be used to replace the tires on his vehicle since they are worn and prevent him from providing the best service to his customers. Jose is extremely grateful to both Emprender and Kiva for demonstrating their confidence in him by providing this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase tires

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio Cesar tiene 39 años, separado, vive solo, tiene una hija, Nayeli de 8 años, a la que siempre va visitar y por quien trabaja tan duramente. Hace un tiempo que se dedica en la venta de pintura para pared, asimismo brinda el servicio de pintor de brocha gorda en exteriores e interiores. Es así que trabaja en su taller que se encuentra a dos horas de su casa, es por ello que debe despertarse muy temprano para llegar a tiempo a su trabajo. Paralelo a este trabajo, también se dedica en la venta de colchones, por lo que le ayuda a tener un ingreso adicional a su economía. Los contratos son buenos y las ventas también es por ello que se siente muy contento. En un futuro espera tener un gran local donde pueda dedicarse en la venta de éste último producto, ya que lo considera más rentable, por el momento desea seguir trabajando en la venta de pinturas y con las ganancias que obtenga pueda cubrir la educación de su hija con el fin de que sea una profesional. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por tanto se compromete a ser muy puntual con todos los pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará andamios que le ayude a pintar los exteriores y una parte comprar colchones para que pueda iniciar su nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is 39 years old, separated and lives alone. Nayeli is his 8 year old daughter who he always goes to visit and for whom he works so hard. He has been working as a wall painter for some time now. He offers his services as an advertisement painter for both interior and exterior work. He works from his studio which is located two hours from home and therefore must wake up very early to arrive to work on time. In addition to this painting work, he also sells mattresses for additional income. Contracts are good and so are sales which is why he is very happy. In the future, he hopes to have a great place where he can engage in the sale of its latest product [mattresses], since he considers it more profitable. In the mean time, he wishes to continue working on selling his paintings as the earnings can cover his child's education to become a professional. This is his first loan with MFP and he agrees to be punctual with all payments. The requested loan will be used to purchase scaffolding which helps the exterior painting and part buy mattresses so he can start his new business.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy painting supplies and buy mattresses to start his new business.

loans.name: Ramón

texts.es:
Ramón C. P., tiene la edad de 60 años, está en unión libre, y vive con la señora y sus cuatro  hijos de 26,24,14 y 12 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de inventario para su negocio. Desea tener un inventario más amplio y variado de productos para ofrecer en su pulpería. Tiene varios años de haber empezado con este negocio, y cuenta con muy buenos clientes, por eso ve la necesidad de ofrecer mayor variedad de productos en el negocio, además de aportar mayores ingresos para la economía de su hogar. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy agradecido con las facilidades que se le han brindado siempre. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como comerciante.
About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Ramón C. P., age 60, is in a common law marriage and lives with his wife and their four children, ages 26, 24, 14, and 12. The loan that he seeks is for the purchase of inventory for his business. He wants to have a larger and more varied inventory to offer in his small grocery shop.

He began this business several years ago and has very good customers. That’s why he sees a need to offer a greater variety of products in the business. In addition, this will bring greater earnings for his household.

This is the first time that he has sought a loan from FUDECOSUR, and he is very grateful for the assistance he has been offered. For the future, he hopes to offer his family a better quality of life and greater economic stability. He also hopes to continue improving as a person and as a businessman. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Richard Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Inventory for a grocery store.

loans.name: Flor Del Bosque Group

texts.es:
El grupo Flor del Bosque está integrado por tres mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es la joven Johana de los Ángeles T. G. quien desde hace dos años junto con su hermana  tiene una pequeña comideria  la cual vende en su casa y distribuye en varias empresas. Ella con el préstamo comprar los insumos para acrecentar su negocio.
Sus compañeras de grupo son Deysi del Rosario G. Rodríguez quien desde hace quince años vende verduras y frutas, Isaura del Carmen C. B.  es propietaria de una pequeña pulpería y Pedro Rolando Gaitán G. quien desde hace dos años y medios tiene una pequeña pulpería. Ellos invertirán el préstamo  en mercadería para sus negocios.
texts.en:
The group Flor del Bosque is made up of 3 hard-working women. One of those is the young Johana de los Ángeles T. G. who has had a small food production business with her sister for 2 years. She sells from her home and distributes them to various companies. With this loan Johana wants to purchase the ingredients to grow her business. Her companions in the group are Deysi del Rosario G. Rodríguez, Isaura del Carmen C. B., and Pedro Rolando Gaitán G.. Deysi has been selling fruit and vegetables for 15 years. Isaura is the proprietor of a small grocery store and Pedro has had a small grocery store for 2 1/2 years. They will invest their loan in the purchase of merchandise for their businesses.

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of good ingredients such as basic grains, meat, vegetables, spices etc

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto R. L., tiene la edad de 49 años, está casado, y vive con su esposa y su hijo de 16 años de edad, y son su mayor prioridad. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, la idea es comprar el abono y el fertilizante. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de café para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Luis también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. 
About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Luis Alberto R. L. is 49 and married. He lives with his wife and 16 year old son, who are his main priority. Luis wants a loan to buy fertiliser to help him cultivate coffee on his farm. He wants to adequately maintain his coffee cultivation to achieve better quality coffee and in turn better profits when sowing time comes. This is the first time he has sought a loan with FUDECOSUR and he is very content with the facilities that they have. Luis has worked in agriculture for many years. He hopes in the future to give his family a better quality of life and better economic stability, and to continue growing as a person and producer. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilisers

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: EL SEÑOR JOSE VIVE EN LA LOCALIDAD DE EL TORNO DISTANTE A 40 KM DE LA CIUDAD DE SANTA CRUZ, SU ACTIVIDAD PRINCIPAL ES LA VENTA DE PAPA SE DEDICA DESDE HACE UN AÑO A ESTA ACTIVIDAD A LA QUE TAMBIEN SE DEDICA SU ESPOSA, TIENE 2 HIJO LOS CUALES ESTAN EN EDAD ESCOLAR,  COMPRAN PAPA DE LOS AGRICULTORES Y LO REVENDEN EN LA CIUDAD DE sANTA CRUZ, TIENEN UN AUTO DONDE TRANSPORTA SU PRODUCTO PARA COMERCIALIZARLO,  TENIENDO ASI ALGO DE GANANACIAS, EN SUS TIEMPO LIBRES SE DEDICA AL TRANSPORTE DE PERSONA EN LA COMUNIDAD, SE DEDICA A ESTAS DOS ACTIVIDADES YA QUE ES SU FUENTE DE INGRESOS PARA MANTENER A SU FAMILIA,  EL DESTINO DEL CREDITO SOLICITADO ES PARA HACERLE MANTENIMIENTO A SU VEHICULO, SE SIENTE AGRADECIDO CON EMPRENDER POR BRINADARLE SU APOYO FINANCIERO.
texts.en:
Sr. Jose lives in the town of El Torno, which is 40km from the city of Santa Cruz. He and his wife have been selling potatoes for a year. They have two children who attend school. Jose buys potatoes from the farmers and sells them in Santa Cruz. He owns a vehicle that is used to transport the products that he will sell.

To earn extra money, Jose provides passenger transport services within the community during his free time. These two business activities are the source of income necessary to support his family. The loan he requested will be used to pay for vehicle maintenance. Jose is grateful to Emprender for providing this financial support.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Vehicle maintenance

loans.name: Margarita Sinaí

texts.es:
Margarita Sinaí C. M., tiene la edad de 47años, es viuda, y vive  con sus tres hijos de 15, 14 y 13 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de inventario para su negocio. Desea tener un inventario más amplio y variado de productos para ofrecer en local. Ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos. Tiene varios años de haber empezado con este negocio, y cuenta con muy buenos clientes, por eso ve la necesidad de ofrecer mayor variedad de productos en el negocio, además de aportar mayores ingresos para la economía de su hogar. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy agradecida con las facilidades que se le han brindado siempre. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como comerciante.
About FUDECOSUR:
The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Margarita Sinaí C. M. is 47 years old. She is a widow and lives with her 3 children, 15, 14, and 13. Margarita is seeking a loan to purchase inventory for her cosmetics business as she wants to have a larger range of inventory and greater variety of products to offer in her area. Margarita has had the business for several years, and has very good customers, to whom she wants to offer a greater variety of products. She also wants better profits to help her household finances. This is the first time Margarita has applied for a loan from FUDECOSUR and she is very thankful for the facilities that they have always provided. In the future Margarita wants to give her family a better quality of life and better economic stability, and continue to grow as a person and businesswoman. About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es: La Sra. Dominga nacio en Potosi el 15 de diciembre de 1945 su esposo el Sr. Felipe no tienen hijos que esten a su cargo ya que son mayores y tienen su vida independiente, hace 10 años que viven y trabajan en Santo Corazon a 5km de limonsito camino a Cañada 2 y hace 6 años que vienen trabajando com emprender, en la cual siembran maiz. yuca, y papa y luego sus productos lo comercializan en el mercado de el Torno, tambien la Sra. Dominga tiene arboles de citricos, estos productos tambien los vende en el mercado de el Torno, con el dinero del credito compraran semillas para la siembra de papa ya  que es temporada de siembra, y este producto se vende todo el año,  es muy trabajadora junto a su esposo lograron construir su casita pero uno de sus deseos es verla terminada, esta muy agradecida con Emprender y Kiva por la confianza brindada en la otorgacion del credito.
texts.en:
Dominga was born in Potosi on December 15th of 1945. She and her husband Felipe do not have children in their care, since their children are grown and live independently. For 10 years they have lived and worked in Santo Corazon, 5 kilometers from Limoncito on the Cañada 2 road, and they have worked with Emprender for 6 years. They cultivate corn, yucca, and potatoes, and later sell their products in the El Torno market. Also, Dominga has citrus trees, and she also sells these products in the El Torno market. With the money from the loan they will buy seeds to plant potatoes, since this is the planting season, and this product is sold all year. She is very hardworking, and with her husband managed to build their small home, but one of their desires is to see it finished. She is very grateful to Emprender and Kiva for the confidence provided in granting this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant potatoes

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander A. S., tiene la edad de 31 años, está casado, y vive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos de 9,8 y 7años de edad, y son su mayor prioridad. El crédito lo quiere para asistir su finca, específicamente para el cultivo de café, la idea es comprar el abono y el fertilizante. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo de café para lograr una mejor calidad y para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando sea tiempo de cosecha. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Alexander  también trabaja desde hace muchos años en la agricultura. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. 
About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org
texts.en:
Alexander A. S., age 31, is married and lives with his wife and their 3 children, ages 9, 8, and 7. His family is his greatest priority. The loan that he seeks will assist on his farm, specifically with the cultivation of coffee. He plans to buy fertilizer in order to give his coffee fields adequate maintenance so that he obtains better quality crops and as much income as possible from his harvest.

This is the first time that he has sought a loan from FUDECOSUR, and he is very pleased with the assistance he has been offered. Don Alexander has worked in agriculture for many years. For the future, he hopes to offer his family a better quality of life and greater economic stability. He also hopes to continue improving as a person and as a farmer, About FUDECOSUR: The Foundation for the Development of Southern Communities is dedicated to economically empowering its clients by providing credit and capacitating programs to improve living conditions of micro-entrepreneurs and their children across Southern Costa Rica. You can obtain more information on FUDECOSUR from the website: FUDECOSUR.org

Translated from Spanish by Richard Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Assistance for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Glenda Yamilet

texts.es:
la sra. Glenda Yamilet E. E. es una mujer que se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, es madre soltera de 4 hijos, se esfuerza mucho para sacar adelante a sus 4 hijos. Glenda todos los dias se levanta a las 4 de la mañana para preparase para atender a su clientela  es por eso que tiene mejor demanda en su negocio.
el prestamo lo necesita para incrementar su inventario de productos y asi tener mejores utilidades.
texts.en:
Sra. Glenda Yamilet E. E. is a woman who engages in the retail business. She manages a store in her home. Glenda is a single mother with four children and works hard so that they can succeed. Every day she wakes up at 4am to prepare herself before attending to her customers. Her business generates great demand.

This loan will be used to increase her inventory of products so that she can generate better earnings.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase merchadise for her store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Feliz

texts.es: Félix tiene 56 años, vive con su esposa en su casa que es propia, juntos tienen 9 hijos, quienes son mayores e independientes.  Toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, actividad que le ha permitido sostener a su familia, hoy sus hijos tiene sus propios hogares, por lo que solo trabaja para él y para su esposa. En  épocas de siembra  trabaja con 2 toros que posee, que la ayudan arar la tierra, de esta manera logra obtener cosechas muy satisfactorias, además que sus campos de cultivo están en una zona estratégica en donde hay canales de riego que ayuda también en el desarrollo de su siembra. Una vez obtenida esta producción son vendidas en el mercado de su zona, Félix ve su recompensa en las ganancias, por lo que espera continuar trabajando en la agricultura. Este es su quinceavo crédito con MFP, por tanto promete ser muy responsable con sus pagos, además considera que este aporte le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará sacos de abono para sembrar nuevamente papa.
texts.en:
Félix, age 46, lives with his wife in their own house. They have 9 children who are grown and independent. All his life he has been involved with farming, an activity that has allowed him to support his family. Today, his children have their own households, and he only works for himself and his wife.

During the planting season, he works with two bulls that help him plow the land. In this way he succeeds in obtaining very satisfactory harvests. Furthermore, his planted fields are strategically located in an area where there are irrigation canals that help with the development of his crops. From the time he first sold his harvest in the local market, Félix saw his reward in his earnings. That’s why he hopes to continue working in farming.

This is his fifteenth loan with MFP, and he promises to be very responsible with his payments. He believes this loan will be very useful for the progress of his business. With the loan he is applying for he will buy sacks of fertilizer for planting potatoes again.

Translated from Spanish by Richard Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase sacks of fertilizer for planting potatoes.

loans.name: Bacilio Orlando

texts.es:
Bacilo Terán de 38 años, vive en una zona periurbana en Paraíso (lugar muy humilde con lomas y caminos de tierra destruidos) de Guayaquil. Su casa es de cemento y cuenta solo con luz como servicio básico. Su esposa le ayuda en la venta de comida, ellos tienen cuatro hijos de 18, 13,6 y 2 años de edad. 

Bacilo trabaja con su esposa vendiendo chuzos (es una comida rápida hecha con distintas carnes y atravesada de un palo, muy común en Ecuador) y alitas de pollo asadas, su esposa le ayuda atendiendo el negocio mientras que el Haza las carnes. Trabajan todos los días hasta las 21:00 pm. 

Su puesto de comida lo tiene en la vereda de su casa, por eso quiere el préstamo para poder construir la parte delantera de su casa y hacerlo un local de comidas. Quiere comprar cemento y ladrillos para la construcción. 

En el futuro el quiere un restaurante para el hacer todas las comidas típicas que ha aprendido.
texts.en:
Bacilo T. is 38 years old. He lives in suburban Paraiso (a modest, hilly area with dilapidated dirt roads), part of the city of Guayaquil. His home is made of cement; he has electricity and some very basic utilities. His wife helps him sell food. Together they have four children, ages 18, 13, 6 and 2. Bacilo and his wife sell chuzos (fast food made from meats stacked on a skewer-- very common in Ecuador) and grilled chicken wings. His wife looks after the business side of things while he prepares the food. They work every day until 9:00 PM. Bacilo’s food stand is near their home. He wants to use this loan to turn the front of his house into a food shop. He plans to buy cement and bricks. He plans to own a restaurant someday, where he can serve all the foods he has learned to prepare.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Cement and bricks to build a food stand.

loans.name: Cristoval

texts.es: El Sr.Cristoval nacio en Cueva Pampa Nor cinty Chuquisaca en Sucre Capital de Bolivia en  septiembre  de 1975. concubino (Que viven en pareja pero no son casados legalmente) con la Sra. Rosa, ellos tienen 5 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar. Hace 15 años que el Señor compro su parcela en cañada 2, son 27 hectareas. El señor actualmente esta sembrando papa, poroto,  y tambien  todos los productos que el cosecha lo vende en el mercado central de el torno. o lo lleva al Abasto el mercado principal de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, es muy responsable y trabajador ya que es el unico que mantiene el hogar ya que con 5 hijos es dificil para el brindarles la comodidad a su familia, uno de sus deseos es el de construir su casa ya que ahora tienen  solo 2 ambientes, con el dinero dle credito comprara semillas para la siembra de Papa,  el cliente esta agradecido con la institucion por el apoyo que le  brindaron en la otorgacion del credito.
texts.en:
Cristoval was born in Cueva Pampa Norcinty Chuquisaca in Sucre, the Bolivian capital in 1975. He has five school aged children. 15 years ago he set up a 27 hectare parcel of land, where he raises potatoes. He either sells his harvest in the central marketplace in Torno, or takes it to the Abasto marketplace, the primary marketplace in Santa Cruz. He is very responsible and hard working, as he provides the sole support for his family. It’s difficult. One of his desires is to build a home with his savings. He will use the money from this loan to buy potato seed. He is grateful to the institution for the support they have given him and for helping him receive this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Potato seed

loans.name: Anibal De Jesus

texts.es:
el sr. Anibal de Jesus C. se dedica a la venta de refrescos en varios lugares cercanos a su comunidad.
Anibal es un hombre emprendedor que a trabajado muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia. 
Anibal se levanta muy temprano todos los dias para cargar su carro de refrescos poder salir a repartir los mismos en diferentes pulperias y mercaditos.
Anibal es padre de 4 hijos y todos dependen de el.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas refrescos ya que los pedidos que tiene de sus clientes son mas grandes y a veces no logra cubrir con la ruta que tiene diaria porque se le acaban los refrescos.
texts.en:
Anibal de Jesus C. sells soft-driks in various locations near his community. He is an enterprising man who has worked very hard to move his family forward in life. Anibal rises very early in the morning every day to load his car with soft-drinks to distribute to various small grocery stores and markets. Anibal has 4 dependent children. He will use the funds to buy more soft-drinks because his customer orders are larger each time and sometimes he doesn’t have sufficient stock to fill all the orders he has in his daily routes because he runs out of soft-drinks.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy soft-drinks.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús tiene 36 años, casado y padre de dos hijos, juntos viven en su casa propia. Desde su niñez se dedicó a las tareas del campo, sembrando hortalizas, como: zanahoria, espinacas, cebolla; así como también alfalfa, que servirá como forraje para sus cuyes, que son alimento primordial de éste animal. Cada mes comercializa cuyes en gran número a una empresa, lo que le genera un ingreso adicional a su economía, eso le da mucha satisfacción a Jesús. Ahora se propone mejorar la crianza de este animal, ya que le están dando buenas rentas. Su trabajo es de todos los días de manera incansable y ahora tiene como meta, ampliar el espacio de su granja y aumentar la producción de cuyes. Este es su catorceavo crédito con MFP, por tanto seguirá siendo muy puntual con sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará sacos de abono para sembrar alfalfa, ya que es el alimetno fundamental de sus cuyes.
texts.en:
Jesús is 36 years old, is married, and has 2 children, who live with him in his own house. Since his childhood he has worked on the land, sowing vegetables such as carrots, spinach and onion. Jesús also plants alfalfa, which serves as food for his guinea pigs, as it is their primary source of food. Each month he sells a large quantity of guinea pigs to a company, giving him additional income, and in turn, great satisfaction. Jesús is proposing to improve and expand his guinea pig breeding as it is giving him very good results. His work is never-ending, every day, and he now has the goal of expanding the space of his barn and increasing the production of guinea pigs. This is his fourteenth loan with MFP, and he will continue to be punctual with his payments as always. With the loan he is seeking his will buy sacks of fertiliser to sow his alfalfa, as it's so important for his guinea pigs.

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase alfalfa as guinea pig feed

loans.name: Jacqueline Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Jacqueline es madre de familia de tres hijos, tiene 45 años de edad, y trabaja en costura desde hace varios años, a si como la preparación y venta de nacatamales, cereales con el propósito de poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos ya que la canasta básica ah incrementado, la ropa, utensilios escolares. Su esposo trabaja en mecánica, soldador  ala vez, con su apoyo logro la inversión de venta de comida y su cliente en costura la logro mediante a sus esfuerzos. Con este préstamo lograra comprar telas variadas, alimentos para hacer nacatamales y así equilibrar sus ventas.
Mediante los financiamientos se ha beneficiado para mantener su negocio y lograr la captación de nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is the mother of three children. She is 45 years old and has worked as a seamstress for many years. She has also prepared and sold Nicaraguan tamales and sold cereals to help her husband with expenses, now that their basic needs and their need for clothing and school materials have increased. Her husband is a mechanic and welder. With his encouragement, she was able to invest her food and seamstress work sales into her business efforts. With this loan, she will be able to buy different cloth and ingredients to make Nicaraguan tamales, and to even out her sales. This financing has benefitted her in maintaining her business and has allowed her to serve new clients.

Translated from Spanish by Flavia Garcia, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of various cloths, also ingredients to make tamales and to increase sales.

loans.name: Urpaypampa Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Urpaypampa inicia su primer ciclo con 8 socias que son de la comunidad de Urpaypampa, Distrito de Vinchos, la mayoría de la población se dedica a la ganadería y agricultura. Solo 4 Socias del Bancomunal Urpaypampa solicitan préstamo y otras 4 socias como son Maruja, Paulina, Celestina y Marleny son solo ahorristas.

Las socias realizan diferentes negocio como es el caso de la Señora Tomasa que es casada y tiene 8 hijos, Tomasa se dedica a la compra de quesos, carne y cereales, productos que adquiere en su zona y los vende en la ciudad de Ayacucho de casa en casa, con sus ganancias mantiene a sus hijos. Con el préstamo que obtendrá comprara cereales. Los sueños de Tomasa son dedicarse a la compra y venta de ganado vacuno y engordar para luego venderlos.
texts.en:
Urpaypampa Community Bank has just started a new loan cycle with 8 members from the community of Urpaypampa, Vinchos District, where most people are involved in farming and agriculture. Just 4 of the group members are requesting a loan; the remaining 4 members (Maruja, Paulina, Celestina and Marleny) are just saving in this loan cycle. The group members have a number of different businesses. For example, Mrs. Tomasa is married with eight children. She buys cheese, meat and grain in her area, then sells them door-to-door in Ayachuco. Mrs. Tomasa uses her earnings to care for her children. She’ll use her portion of the loan to buy more grain. One day, she’d like to buy, raise and sell cattle.

Translated from Spanish by Corinne Gilroy, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying cereal grains.

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.es: La Sra. Guillerma  nacio en Laibato provincia Campero de la ciudad de Cochabamba, el 10 de enero de 1973, ella esta casada y tienen 1 hijo que le ayuda en la siembra de sus productos, toda la familia se dedica a la agricultura, y se apoyan entre ellos. Hace 15 años que la señora compro su parcela en Rural 2 de Mayo, son 4 hectareas  La  señora actualmente esta sembrando papa, poroto, y tambien tiene  muchos productos que ella cosecha y lo vende en el mercado central de el torno. Con el dinero del Credito comprara semillas para la siembra de Papa ya que es su temporada de siembra,  La cliente esta agradecida con la institucion por el apoyo que le brindaron en la otorgacion del credito, son personas trabajadoras con ganas de salir adelante desean mejorar la condicion de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Guillermina was born in Laibato, Campero province of the city of Cochabamba, on 10 January 1973. She is married and has a son that helps her with her farm chores; the entire family is in farming and help each other out. Fifteen years ago she bought a 4 hectare lot in Rural 2 de Mayo; she farms potato, poroto (kidney beans) plus a lot of other products that she grows and sells in El Torno’s central market. She will use the funds to buy potato seed because the potato planting season is beginning. She is grateful to the institution for the help it provided in granting the loan. They are hard-working people with much desire to get ahead in life and improve the living conditions of their whole family.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy potato seed.

loans.name: San Juan Bautista Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal San Juan B. inicia su primer ciclo con 8 socias que son del Distrito D. Huaytara, departamento D. Huancavelica, la comunidad esta ubicada a 4 horas D. la ciudad D. Ayacucho, las actividades principales D. la comunidad son la ganadería y la industrialización D. lácteos.
Las socias realizan diferentes negocios como la venta D. abarrotes, comida, frutas y la elaboración D. productos lácteos.
Como es el caso D. la señora Elvira es presidenta del Banco Comunal, Elvira es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos D. los cuales 2 son varones y 1 mujer, Elvira se dedica a la crianza D. ganado vacuno, del cual obtiene leche que luego procesa en quesos, su negocio se ubica en la comunidad D. Chocorvo, sus ventas los realiza en su Distrito y en algunas oportunidades lleva a la ciudad D. Lima, actividad que realiza con la ayuda D. su esposo. Su préstamo será invertido en la compra D. quesos D. los demás productores D. la zona. Elvira quiere capacitarse para mejorar día a día en el ámbito familiar y también en el negocio.
Los sueños D. Elvira son comprar su casa en Lima, construir un hotel en su comunidad y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The communal bank San Juan B. begins its new cycle with 8 members from the district of Huaytara, departament of Huancavelica. The community is located 4 hours from the city of Ayacucho. The principal activities in the community are cattle farming and industrialized dairy production. The members have different businesses, such as selling groceries, food, fruit and making dairy products. Such is the case of Elvira, president of the communal bank. Elvira is in a common law marriage and has 3 children, two boys and a girl. Elvira raises cattle from which she obtains milk that she later makes into cheese. Her business is located in the community of Chocorvo. She sells in her district and at times she takes it to the city of Lima. She does this with the help of her husband. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of cheeses from the other producers in the area. Elivira wants to train to improve every day in her family and in her business as well. Elvira's dreams are to buy a house in Lima, to build a hotel in her community snd for her children to have a profession.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase cheeses

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: El Sr. Armando nacio en Padilla Tomina Chuquisaca Sucre Capital de Bolivia el 22 de enerode 1979. concubino( que viven como pareja pero no se casaron) con la Sra. Paulina,  ellos tienen 4 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar. Hace 20 años que el Señor compro su parcela en Santo Corazon de  5 hectareas. El señor actualmente esta sembrando maiz, yuca, papa, los productos que el cosecha lo vende en el mercado central de el torno. es una persona trabajadora y responsable su esposa y sus hijos le ayudan en la siembra y cosecha de sus productos, con el dinero del credito comprara semillas para la siembra de Papa.  el cliente esta agradecido con la institucion por el apoyo que le han brindado ademas que es su primer credito y se siente bastante contento. sus sueños del señor armando es que comprarse un camioncito	para poder trasladar sus productos a los diferentes mercados de la zona.
texts.en:
